column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Stopped by Cafe BBR for desserts and wine
column2: actually (had dinner at another place down the street) and being my first tapas restaurant
column3: I thought it was pretty cool. Our server
column4: who was also a fellow Californian
column5: was very nice and easy going. We had ice cream and I also had a glass of the white peach sangria
column6: mmm. I promise to come back for the food!
